bibl.title: La techne grammatike e la documentazione papiracea.
bibl.note: Deals with the problem of the use of papyrological data in order to establish the chronology of the Techne grammatike ascribed to Dionysius Thrax. Uses the evidence of P. Bingen 8 (= M.-P.3 1166.1; LDAB 7989), P. Berol. Inv. 10508-10512 (= M.-P.3 1191, 1196, 1198-1199; LDAB 1512) and P. Oslo II, 13 (= M.-P.3 2148; LDAB 4791). - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Rivista di filologia e d'istruzione classica

bibl.seg: Lara Pagani, La techne grammatike e la documentazione papiracea.

Deals with the problem of the use of papyrological data in order to establish the chronology of the Techne grammatike ascribed to Dionysius Thrax. Uses the evidence of P. Bingen 8 (= M.-P.3 1166.1; LDAB 7989), P. Berol. Inv. 10508-10512 (= M.-P.3 1191, 1196, 1198-1199; LDAB 1512) and P. Oslo II, 13 (= M.-P.3 2148; LDAB 4791). - Avec résumé en anglais.
